column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////But it is what it is
column2: it's just OK to me and I probably wouldn't come back unless someone really wanted it. I understand the prep of food is done prior
column4: chasu. But my chasu was so cold
column5: and I think it's because the soup might not have been hot enough to heat it fast it enough before it reached the table. Just to clarify
column8: the fat on the pork belly? It's cold
